char map[195] = {
	0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b01000111,
	0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111,0b01000111
    };

Ceci est une map avec juste les murs incassables et les espaces (herbe) entre pour marcher

Bonus nombre bombe : 	00001010 -> Decimal : 10 -> Hexa : 0x0A
Mur indestructible : 	01000111 -> Decimal : 71 -> Hexa : 0x47
Case en feu :        	10000111 -> Decimal : 135 -> Hexa : 0x87
Herbe :              	00000111 -> Decimal : 7 -> Hexa : 0x07
Case avec bomb dessus : 00010111 -> Decimal : 23 -> Hexa 0x17

Pour affich√© la variable map :

int i = 0;
while(i < sizeof(map)) {
	printf("%d ", map[i]);
	i = i + 1;
}
